org.waag.histograph.reasoner

Class ReasoningDefinitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waag.histograph.reasoner.ReasoningDefinitions

  • public final class ReasoningDefinitions
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing reasoning rules and definitions for the Neo4j graph.
    Author:
    Rutger van Willigen, Bert Spaan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ReasoningDefinitions.NodeType
      The single node type in the Neo4j graph is 'PIT'.
      static class  ReasoningDefinitions.RelationType
      An enumeration of all Relationship types (defined at http://histograph.io/concepts/) and their String representations.

    • Field Detail

      • PRIMARY_RELATIONS

        public static final java.lang.String[] PRIMARY_RELATIONS
        Contains the String representations of all primary relations defined at http://histograph.io/concepts/.

      • TRANSITIVE_RELATIONS

        public static final java.lang.String[] TRANSITIVE_RELATIONS
        Contains all transitive relations, i.e. (a) --[rel]--) (b) --[rel]--) (c) IMPL (a) --[rel]--) (c)

    • Method Detail

      • getAtomicRelationsFromLabel

        public static java.lang.String[] getAtomicRelationsFromLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Get all atomic relationships associated with a provided relationship.
        Parameters:
        label - The primary relationship's String representation.
        Returns:
        An array of atomic relationships associated with the primary relationship, or null if no atomic relationships are associated.

      • getAllRelations

        public static java.lang.String[] getAllRelations()
        Returns an array of all defined relationships.
        Returns:
        An array containing String representations of all defined relationships.

      • getPrimaryRelationsFromAtomic

        public static java.lang.String[] getPrimaryRelationsFromAtomic(java.lang.String relation)
        Returns all primary relationships associated with a given atomic relationship.
        Parameters:
        relation - An atomic relationship.
        Returns:
        An array of String representations of the primary relationships associated with the given atomic relationship, or null if no such relationships are found.
